GetAntiFraudVip.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: afc.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: GetAntiFraudVip
<公共请求参数>

{
    "BusinessSecurityData": {
        "AppIdU": "0",
        "PhoneCryptoType": "0",
        "WifiSSID": "0",
        "IdCryptoType": "0",
        "Imsi": "0",
        "CustomerSubUin": "0",
        "Mac": "0",
        "Idfa": "0",
        "Authorization": "0",
        "Address": "0",
        "Imei": "0",
        "WifiBSSID": "0",
        "BankCardNumber": "0",
        "ExtensionId": "0",
        "Name": "0",
        "ExtensionIn": "0",
        "CustomerUin": "0",
        "UserIp": "0",
        "PhoneNumber": "0",
        "CustomerAppid": "0",
        "NameCryptoType": "0",
        "Uid": "0",
        "WifiMac": "xx",
        "BusinessId": "0",
        "Scene": "0",
        "IdNumber": "0",
        "EmailAddress": "0",
        "AccountType": "0"
    },
    "BusinessCryptoData": {
        "CryptoType": "0",
        "CryptoContent": "0"
    }
}
GetAntiFraudVip.title: 反欺诈VIP评分接口

TransportGeneralInterface.title: TransportGeneralInterface
接入方拉取“存管证书”接口(InterfaceName: GetCertResult)
用户协议签署接口(InterfaceName: UploadUserProtocol)
拉取当前数据类型状态的接口(InterfaceName: GetSitesState)
接入方拉取“取证解析文件”的接口（InterfaceName: GetParseResult）
接入方拉取取证文件接口(InterfaceName: GetOriginalFiles)
更新 AES 加密密钥接口 (InterfaceName:UpdateAesKey)
